description: The AI analysis workflow is orchestrated by the Meta-Orchestration Agent, which serves as the central conductor, initiating analysis tasks and delegating specific queries to Specialized Analysis Agents. These specialized agents perform in-depth analysis, leveraging Agent Tooling to interact with the codebase and extract granular insights. Both the Meta-Orchestration Agent and Specialized Analysis Agents utilize Agent Tooling for their operational needs. Upon completing their tasks, both types of agents send their analytical outputs to Agent Response Management. This component is crucial for structuring, validating, and managing all generated responses, ensuring consistency and readiness for downstream consumption. The Meta-Orchestration Agent then synthesizes the findings received from the Specialized Analysis Agents to form a comprehensive architectural understanding.

components.name: Meta-Orchestration Agent
components.description: This component acts as the high-level conductor for the entire AI analysis workflow. It initiates analysis tasks, delegates specific queries to specialized agents, and synthesizes their findings to construct a comprehensive architectural understanding.

components.name: Specialized Analysis Agents
components.description: These agents are designed to perform in-depth, focused analysis on particular aspects of the codebase or architectural patterns. They receive targeted instructions from the Meta-Orchestration Agent and apply their domain-specific knowledge, often using the Agent Tooling, to extract granular insights.

components.name: Agent Tooling
components.description: This component provides a standardized collection of tools and capabilities that AI agents can invoke to interact with the project's codebase, execute static analysis, query external knowledge bases, or perform other necessary operations. It abstracts complex underlying systems, allowing agents to concentrate on analytical reasoning.

components.name: Agent Response Management
components.description: This component is responsible for structuring, validating, and managing the outputs and feedback generated by the various AI agents. It ensures that responses are consistent, adhere to predefined schemas, and can be efficiently consumed by downstream components for further processing or documentation generation.

components_relations.relation: delegates tasks to and receives findings from
